verses.name: Ezekiel 18:13
verses.text: Hath given forth upon usury, and hath taken increase: shall he then live? he shall not live: he hath done all these abominations; he shall surely die; his blood shall be upon him.

verses.name: Ezekiel 18:14
verses.text: Now, lo, if he beget a son, that seeth all his father’s sins which he hath done, and considereth, and doeth not such like,

verses.name: Ezekiel 18:15
verses.text: That hath not eaten upon the mountains, neither hath lifted up his eyes to the idols of the house of Israel, hath not defiled his neighbour’s wife,
